ComicInfo.Series: Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - The Journey Begins
ComicInfo.Summary:
A BOLD NEW ERA IN BEST-SELLING AUTHOR STEPHEN KINGS’S EPIC CONTINTUES! A forgotten betrayal from his youth rears its ugly head as the adult Roland Deschain forges his way through the ruins of his childhood home, Gilead. But will Roland learn from the ghost of this mistake…or will history put the last gunslinger in his grave?
